description: Archaeology of the Modern World from the Columbian voyage (1492) to the 20th century. Topics such as the rise of early modern Europe, European exploration and colonization, African American Archaeology, Asian American Archaeology, the rise of colonial society, contact with native peoples, the Industrial Revolution, and the archaeology of the 20th century will be covered.
name: HISTORICAL ARCHAEOLOGY: Historical Archaeology 2009: Current and Future Directions

section.name: HISTORICAL ARCHAEOLOGY: Historical Archaeology 2009: Current and Future Directions
